review: Very usefull little gadget, with very good build quality. It's easy to stream things from the notebook browser, yet easy to use with your Android phone or Apple iPhone. Would like more streaming options for the iPhone: you can stream your camera roll or videos directly with the Chromecast app. There are third party apps to do that, but the workflow is not so good.

review: Enables you to cast to your TV what you see in your Smartphone, Tablet or PC. Simple to setup, Netflix, Pandora, ESPN etc access. Can control from your Tablet or Android phone. Small, fully portable and priced just right.
